DataStructures
Class BinaryHeap

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--DataStructures.BinaryHeap
public class BinaryHeap
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a binary heap. Note that all "matching" is based on the compareTo method.

          Construct the binary heap.
